How walkable is your Bozeman neighborhood?

And how does it stack up against other parts of town?

Bozeman's parks ( ) and schools ( ) are spread throughout the community, but establishments like restaurants ( ), coffee shops ( ) and grocery stores ( ) tend to cluster along major roads — meaning not everyone has easy access to them on foot or bike.

Tap a spot on the map to see how far it is from the closest amenities, or hit the buttons below to see how two points in southside and westside Bozeman compare.

Interactive by Eric Dietrich, using Leaflet. Source code on Github. Map tiles by Stamen Design, under CC BY 3.0 and OpenStreetMap, under ODbL.
